participant_a.entity_text: Osman et al., L. plantarum HEAL19

verbose_text: In a study by Osman et al., L. plantarum HEAL19, administered separately or with blueberry husks, was shown to reduce the severity of dextran sulphate sodium-(DSS-) induced colitis in rats when compared with the control group fed standard rat chow.
evidence: Osman et al., L. plantarum HEAL19, administered separately or with blueberry husks, was shown to reduce the severity of dextran sulphate
